TopicTitle: I can't get the outer planet Mod to work in KSP 0.90!

Articles.Content:
I'm tying to get a 0.90 version of outer planets mod to work in my KSP 0.90 by putting in my Gamedata, but none of the planets show up! Please help me- it's especially frustrating, because it had been working for some time before I reinstalled the mod.;.;
Sorry guys, I'm in a hurry. If you need any more information, I will tell you.

For OPM you need Kopernikus as a depency.

OPM 1.6 is max Version for 0.90.
But i am not shure, if Kopernikus was ever released for 0.90.

Look into readme/how to install at OPM 1.6.
